name: Framed Gallery
author: We Are Panda / Paul Riley

sections.description:
Framed Gallery allows you to display your photos in a grid layout with faux-wood frames.

There are 20 styles to choose from. Each example is headed by the correct style to use if you want to show that frame style.

Shortcode

[wap_gallery style=”” cols”” limit=””]

style: use the headings from the examples section
cols: 1, 2, 3 or 4
limit: numeric

Examples

Some examples can be found here
sections.installation:
1. Unzip the wap-framed-gallery archive into your websitesplugins` folder.
  2. Visit your plugins page in the backend and activate the plugin
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Unzip the wap-framed-gallery archive into your websitesplugins` folder.
  2. Visit your plugins page in the backend and activate the plugin
